name: Lithia Motors, Inc.
summary: Lithia Motors, Inc. is one of the largest automotive retailers in the United States, offering new and used vehicles, financing, insurance, and automotive repair services through a vast network of dealerships. Founded in 1946 and headquartered in Medford, Oregon, Lithia has expanded its operations across the U.S., Canada, and the U.K., and is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker LAD.
